description: As a4SSTice, but CO2 is quadrupled, and the increase in CO2 is seen by both the radiation scheme and vegetation.
keywords: CFMIP, Tier 2, SST pattern anomaly, sea ice anomaly, piSST, abrupt4xCO2, piControl
long_name: control plus warming pattern SSTs and SIC with 4xCO2

requirements.description: Run for the 30 years corresponding to years 111-140 of the abrupt-4xCO2 simulation.
requirements.label: 1960-1989 30yrs

requirements.description: Monthly-varying sea surface temperature from years 111 to 140 of the abrupt4xCO2 simulation.
requirements.label: abrupt4xCO2SST

requirements.description: Monthly-varying sea ice concentrations from years 111 to 140 of the abrupt4xCO2 simulation.
requirements.label: abrupt4xCO2SIC

requirements.description: Impose a quadrupling of pre-industrial carbon dioxide (CO2) concentrations to radiative code.
requirements.label: 4xCO2Radiation

requirements.description: Impose a quadrupling of pre-industrial carbon dioxide (CO2) concentrations to vegetation code.
requirements.label: 4xCO2Veg

requirements.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding carbon dioxide, excluding co2
requirements.label: PIForcingExcludingCO2

requirements.description: An Atmosphere only general circulation model configuration.
requirements.label: AGCM Configuration
